languages.text: {n}Идира кивает.{/n} "Теперь буду полезной и эффективной до безобразия — я больше не обуза. Только есть ощущение, что чего-то не хватает. Наверное, с непривычки. Друзья мои из-за дверки взбеленились, когда я эту штуку нацепила, ужасы всякие, как обычно, начали шептать... но я их просто заткнула и дверку прикрыла. Впервые в жизни так сделать смогла".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира кивает.{/n} "Теперь буду полезной и эффективной до безобразия — я больше не обуза. Только есть ощущение, что чего-то не хватает. Наверное, с непривычки. Друзья мои из-за дверки взбеленились, когда я эту штуку нацепила, ужасы всякие, как обычно, начали шептать... но я их просто заткнула и дверку прикрыла. Впервые в жизни так сделать смогла".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira nods.{/n} "Now I'll be useful and efficient to a fault. I'm no longer a burden. Except I feel like something's missing. This thing probably just takes some getting used to. My pals behind the door threw a fit when I put it on, they started whispering all kinds of horror stories, as per usual... Well, I just shut them up and closed the door a little. It's the first time in my whole life that I've been able to do that."

Well, I just shut them up and closed the door a little. It's the first time in my whole life I've been able to pull it off."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉点了点头。{/n}“我会变得既有用、又安全，不再会成为你的累赘。只不过，我感觉像是少了什么一样，可能得花些时间才能适应。当我戴上这件装置的时候，门后的那些伙伴大发雷霆，它们开始像往常一样，窃窃私语各种各样的恐怖故事……不过我把门关上了一点，让它们闭嘴了。这还是我这辈子第一次能控制住它们。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods.{/n} "Now I'll be useful and efficient to a fault. I'm no longer a burden. Except I feel like something's missing. This thing probably just takes some getting used to. My pals behind the door threw a fit when I put it on, they started whispering all kinds of horror stories, as per usual... Well, I just shut them up and closed the door a little. It's the first time in my whole life that I've been able to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉点了点头。{/n}“我会变得既有用、又安全，不再会成为你的累赘。只不过，我感觉像是少了什么一样，可能得花些时间才能适应。当我戴上这件装置的时候，门后的那些伙伴大发雷霆，它们开始像往常一样，窃窃私语各种各样的恐怖故事……不过我把门关上了一点，让它们闭嘴了。这还是我这辈子第一次能控制住它们。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira asiente.{/n} «Ahora seré tan útil y eficiente que no sabrá qué hacer conmigo. Ya no soy una carga... pero siento que me falta algo. Probablemente lleve un tiempo acostumbrarse a esto. Mis amigos al otro lado de la puerta se pusieron como locos cuando me lo coloqué, y empezaron a susurrar todo tipo de historias de terror, como de costumbre... Los mandé a callar y cerré un poco la puerta. Ha sido la primera vez en mi vida que he podido hacerlo».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods.{/n} "Now I'll be useful and efficient to a fault. I'm no longer a burden. Except I feel like something's missing. This thing probably just takes some getting used to. My pals behind the door threw a fit when I put it on, they started whispering all kinds of horror stories, as per usual... Well, I just shut them up and closed the door a little. It's the first time in my whole life that I've been able to do that."

Probablemente lleve un tiempo acostumbrarse a esto. Mis amigos al otro lado de la puerta se pusieron como locos cuando me lo coloqué, y empezaron a susurrar todo tipo de historias de terror, como de costumbre... Los mandé a callar y cerré un poco la puerta. Ha sido la primera vez en mi vida que he podido hacerlo».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira nickt.{/n} "Ab jetzt bin ich absolut nützlich und effizient. Ich bin keine Last mehr. Nur habe ich das Gefühl, dass etwas fehlt. Ich brauche wahrscheinlich einfach eine Weile, um mich an das Ding zu gewöhnen. Meine Freunde hinter der Tür sind wahnsinnig geworden, als ich es angezogen habe. Sie haben wie üblich allerlei Horrorgeschichten geflüstert ... Aber ich habe sie einfach zum Schweigen gebracht und die Tür ein wenig geschlossen. Es ist das erste Mal in meinem Leben, dass mir das gelungen ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods.{/n} "Now I'll be useful and efficient to a fault. I'm no longer a burden. Except I feel like something's missing. This thing probably just takes some getting used to. My pals behind the door threw a fit when I put it on, they started whispering all kinds of horror stories, as per usual... Well, I just shut them up and closed the door a little. It's the first time in my whole life that I've been able to do that."

Ich brauche wahrscheinlich einfach eine Weile, um mich an das Ding zu gewöhnen. Meine Freunde hinter der Tür sind wahnsinnig geworden, als ich es angezogen habe. Sie haben wie üblich allerlei Horrorgeschichten geflüstert ... Aber ich habe sie einfach zum Schweigen gebracht und die Tür ein wenig geschlossen. Es ist das erste Mal in meinem Leben, dass mir das gelungen ist."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラはうなずく。{/n}「今のあたいなら役に立てるし、能力も発揮できる。もうお荷物なんかじゃないって言えるけど、何かが足りない気がするの。ちょっと慣れが必要ね。これを着けたら、扉の向こうの仲間たちがカンカンに怒って、いつものようにいろんな怖い話を囁き始めたのよ…だから彼らを黙らせて、扉を少し閉めたの。そんなことができたのは生まれて初めてよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods.{/n} "Now I'll be useful and efficient to a fault. I'm no longer a burden. Except I feel like something's missing. This thing probably just takes some getting used to. My pals behind the door threw a fit when I put it on, they started whispering all kinds of horror stories, as per usual... Well, I just shut them up and closed the door a little. It's the first time in my whole life that I've been able to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラはうなずく。{/n}「今のあたいなら役に立てるし、能力も発揮できる。もうお荷物なんかじゃないって言えるけど、何かが足りない気がするの。ちょっと慣れが必要ね。これを着けたら、扉の向こうの仲間たちがカンカンに怒って、いつものようにいろんな怖い話を囁き始めたのよ…だから彼らを黙らせて、扉を少し閉めたの。そんなことができたのは生まれて初めてよ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira acquiesce.{/n} « Je serai désormais irréprochablement utile et efficace. Je ne serai plus un fardeau. Sauf que j'ai l'impression qu'il me manque quelque chose. Mais il faut probablement que je m'y habitue. Mes amis de l'autre côté de la porte ont piqué une crise quand je l'ai mis. Ils ont commencé à me murmurer toutes sortes d'histoires horribles, comme à leur habitude... Mais je leur ai cloué le bec en refermant un peu la porte. C'est la première fois de ma vie que j'ai réussi à le faire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods.{/n} "Now I'll be useful and efficient to a fault. I'm no longer a burden. Except I feel like something's missing. This thing probably just takes some getting used to. My pals behind the door threw a fit when I put it on, they started whispering all kinds of horror stories, as per usual... Well, I just shut them up and closed the door a little. It's the first time in my whole life that I've been able to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira acquiesce.{/n} « Je serai désormais irréprochablement utile et efficace. Je ne serai plus un fardeau. Sauf que j'ai l'impression qu'il me manque quelque chose. Mais il faut probablement que je m'y habitue. Mes amis de l'autre côté de la porte ont piqué une crise quand je l'ai mis. Ils ont commencé à me murmurer toutes sortes d'histoires horribles, comme à leur habitude... Mais je leur ai cloué le bec en refermant un peu la porte. C'est la première fois de ma vie que j'ai réussi à le faire. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira başını sallıyor.{/n} "Artık fazlasıyla işe yarar ve etkili olacağım. Sana ayak bağı olmayacağım. Fakat bir şey eksikmiş gibi hissediyorum. Bu cihaza alışmak biraz zaman alacaktır. Kapının ardındaki dostlarım, cihazı takınca çok sinirlendi. Her zamanki gibi türlü korku hikâyelerini fısıldamaya başladılar. Ben de onları susturdum, kapıyı biraz örttüm. Bunu hayatımda ilk kez yapabildim."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira nods.{/n} "Now I'll be useful and efficient to a fault. I'm no longer a burden. Except I feel like something's missing. This thing probably just takes some getting used to. My pals behind the door threw a fit when I put it on, they started whispering all kinds of horror stories, as per usual... Well, I just shut them up and closed the door a little. It's the first time in my whole life that I've been able to do that."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira başını sallıyor.{/n} "Artık fazlasıyla işe yarar ve etkili olacağım. Sana ayak bağı olmayacağım. Fakat eksik bir şey varmış gibi hissediyorum. Bu cihaza alışmak biraz zaman alacak gibi gözüküyor. Kapının ardındaki dostlarım cihazı takınca çok sinirlendi, her zamanki gibi türlü korku hikâyelerini fısıldamaya başladılar. Ben de onları susturdum, kapıyı biraz örttüm. Bunu hayatım boyunca ilk kez yapabildim."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
